attributes.action: Mr Simon Martin of REAL ALE CRAFT BEER on YouTube for MBE for service to Beer
attributes.additional_details: Please see above. Simon is a man that has dedicated his life to YouTube and the enjoyment of others. He has over 40 thousand subscribers that watch him daily.
attributes.background: Simon Martin has a YouTube channel. REAL ALE CRAFT BEER. This YouTube channel has been going for 10 years and in that time Simon has brought a lot of joy and happiness to people. He is funny, kind and makes beer an interesting pastime. He deserves an MBE for his time and dedication.

rejection.details:
It’s about honours or appointments.

We can’t accept petitions about appointments. If you want to nominate someone for an honour you can find out how to do so here: https://www.gov.uk/honours
